meanings.sent1: The manservant opened the door for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family hired a manservant to help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The manservant accidentally spilled tea on the lady of the house.
meanings.sent4: He was a loyal manservant, always ready to assist his master.
meanings.sent5: The manservant's uniform was crisp and well-maintained.

meanings.definition: A man employed to perform domestic duties.
meanings.sent1: The manservant dusted the furniture in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The mansion had a team of manservants to keep it running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The manservant comically tried to cook dinner but ended up burning it.
meanings.sent4: He was the manservant of the household, ensuring everything was in order.
meanings.sent5: The manservant's attention to detail impressed his employers.
